isocline.reflow

Interface Activity

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PlanImpl

    public interface Activity
    Indicates that an activity can be controlled. The Activity interface provides synchronized execution by the block method.
    See Also:
    Plan

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Activity block()
      Wait until the activity process is complete.
      Activity block(long timeout) 
      Activity emit(WorkEvent event)
      Emits a WorkEvent which is valid only in the local scope
      Activity emit(WorkEvent event, long delayTime)
      Emits a WorkEvent which is valid only in the local scope
      Activity finish(Date endDateTime)
      Finish an Activity at a user-defined time.
      Activity finish(String isoDateTime)
      Finish an Activity at a user-defined time.
      Activity finishFromNow(long milliSeconds)
      s Finish an Activity at a user-defined time.
      Throwable getError()
      Returns Throwable object if an error exists
      FlowProcessor getFlowProcessor()
      Returns a FlowProcessor object.
      long getIntervalTime()
      Returns an execute interval time

      Returns a Workflow instance which generates this Activity

      • finish

        Activity finish(String isoDateTime)
         throws ParseException
        Finish an Activity at a user-defined time.
        Parameters:
        isoDateTime - this date-time as a String, such as 2019-06-16T10:15:30Z or 2019-06-16T10:15:30+01:00[Europe/Paris].
        Returns:
        an instance of WorkFlow
        Throws:
        ParseException - If isoDataTime is not correct format
